forum.content:
HIIT stands for "high intensity interval training". which has been proven one of the most efficient way for weight loss.

As we do have a workout professional here in Taiwan calls himself "一休" and his huge group of fans so called "休粉". If you're ever interested in health building or weight loss. I'd suggest you to google the name mentioned above right away.

my weight dropped from almost 82 to 64 during last year. Comparing to those successor "休粉"s that's really nothing tho. Just to give you a reference who's reading my post that I have tested myself.

urls.description: Science-backed reasons why high-intensity interval training should be part of your regular routine.
urls.title: 8 Proven Benefits of HIIT

forum.title: Let's HIIT today
